attributes.action: Keep Gyms open during lockdown period and make them a part of Essential Business
attributes.additional_details:
The virus has affected many individuals and thankfully a lot of our people have survived it. This is due to having a clean bill of health which is procured in a gym environment. 

Gyms have proactively spaced out equipment to keep distance. The cleaning regimen, even by members, is so through, I could eat my dinner off the gym floor. 

Just as much as we need schools to stay open for the future of our children, we need gyms to stay open for the future of our healths’.
attributes.background: The government need to keep gyms open regardless of a lockdown. Gyms are to be considered just as essential as supermarkets for food.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
